short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrapes phone numbers from the current tab and copies them to clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used while making calls in the SDR role to save time copying and pasting phone numbers when making cold calls. Use Control+Shift+Q to copy any numbers from the tab you are on in Chrome
